name: Casey Lauren's Cheesy Crab Sweet Potato Hashbrowns
author: Casey Lauren Townsend
summary: These are an easy and scrumptious snack or side dish! Instead of frying, you may also try baking them.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
salt and black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley for garnish
directions: Beat the eggs in a mixing bowl; whisk in the mayonnaise, mustard, seafood seasoning, and chili powder
Add the sweet potatoes, crabmeat, mozzarella cheese, and lemon zest
Season to taste with salt and pepper; mix until evenly combined
Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Scoop heaping spoonfuls of the sweet potato mixture into the heated pan
Flatten into 3-inch circles and cook until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side
Repeat with remaining sweet potato mixture
